title: Burnley: Ask your pre-season questions
title_page: Burnley: Ask your pre-season questions - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Burnley in before the big kick-off on Friday, 11 August?
We'll put a selection of your questions on all things Clarets to our BBC Sport reporter for their insider take - so ask whatever you'd like to know.
